effects: You always have the spells in the Circle of the Sea Spells table prepared at the druid levels shown.
You expend one use of Wild Shape to manifest a 5-foot emanation of ocean spray for 10 minutes.

When you manifest it and as a bonus action on subsequent turns, choose a creature you can see in the emanation; it makes a Constitution save against your spell save DC or takes cold damage and (if Large or smaller) is pushed up to 15 feet away.
Damage equals a number of d6s equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
limits: The emanation ends early if you dismiss it (no action required), manifest it again, or have the Incapacitated condition.
notes: saving throw DC formula noted in effects

effects: Your Wrath of the Sea emanation increases to 10 feet.
You gain a swim speed equal to your speed.
While Wrath of the Sea is active, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed.
You have resistance to cold, lightning, and thunder damage.
You can manifest Wrath of the Sea around one willing creature within 60 feet instead of yourself; it uses your spell save DC and Wisdom modifier.
If you expend two uses of Wild Shape, you can manifest it around both the creature and yourself.
notes: saving throw DC formula noted in effects
